text:
On 11 December 2018 a terrorist attack happened in Strasbourg, France. Five people were shot dead and several others were injured. The suspect, a 29 years old man who was known to the security services and thought of as an extremist was wounded in an exchange of fire with a soldier, is at large.
The incident occurred near Place Kléber, where Christkindelsmärik, a Christmas market, was being held.
